1. First half of amplitude returns is 0-polarized (x) and some y-polarized (90). Second half is 90-polarized (y).
2. 

Back half are only dependent on y
Front half are dependent on y and x. Send x only and the front half is the same as the back half with y only.
Front half with x and y is weird.

y at 2, 4
